Articles.Content:
Hello, whenever I try to install Kopernicus, CKAN gives me this error message

CKAN.InvalidModuleFileKraken: Kopernicus 2:release-1.12.1-139: C:\Users\liamc\AppData\Local\CKAN\downloads\downloading\41C4F207-Kopernicus-2-release-1.12.1-139.zip has length 1077014, should be 1074657
   at CKAN.NetModuleCache.Store(CkanModule module, String path, IProgress`1 progress, String description, Boolean move)
   at CKAN.NetAsyncModulesDownloader.ModuleDownloadComplete(Uri url, String filename, Exception error, String etag)
Edit: installed Prevous version of Kopernicus, where can i report this as a bug
